response.original_title: Jarred Christmas: Live From A Village Pub
response.overview: Jarred Christmas has released his first ever stand-up comedy special.  Live From A Village Pub is jam packed with his best jokes and stories. Hailing from New Zealand, Jarred now lives in a small English village and it has changed his life.  Award winning comedian Jarred Christmas takes you on a laugh packed journey through encounters with a German drag Queen, a dare gone wrong, how to win monopoly and the trouble with telling rude jokes at primary school.
response.title: Jarred Christmas: Live From A Village Pub
